title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Designing a Sustainable Mobile Microlearning Program: Stakeholder

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage proficiency and possession of intermediate job-related knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain three principles of sustainable e-learning program design.
Learners can design one microlearning module reflecting stakeholder needs analysis.
Learners can apply strategies to maximize operational efficiency in constrained technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
